title: Bedros Keuilian - The Privilege of being Underprivileged
itunes:title: Bedros Keuilian - The Privilege of being Underprivileged
description:
Everybody's playing small these days. Taking the easy path, using scammy tactics, generally running on bullshit. That's generally the approach of someone who has no interest in working hard or getting passionate about what they do. The secret? Those things are the starting point of a life you haven't even imagined yet.
 
Bedros Keuilian’s story started as an uphill battle. Even after his family escaped communism in Armenia, he faced extreme poverty, violence and bullying from those around him. The adversity lit a fire in Bedros, and he buckled down and got to work. Now, Bedros has multi-million dollar companies across multiple industries to his name and continues to grow as an author, speaker, the CEO of Fit Body Boot Camp and co-host of the Empire Show.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach and Bedros talk truth about the upside-down ideas we have about privilege, the art of staying blissfully dissatisfied, why verifying the people around you matters, and building confidence by racking up wins one by one. Join the conversation for the reality check you need to blow past your limits.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/bedros-keuilian/
 
Get More Involved:

  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
